content.text: Hello, I am a test sign read in from a json file! Please enjoy reading me as it took a lot of coordination to get this content here. It might even have paging due to its length??
This is dialog piece number two for good ole test sign.
Just want to make sure I can get a list of these bad boys in without too much trouble :V
Hello, I am a second sign that's just kinda hanging out, having a good time
See that pile of leaves over there, I bet if you jumped on it really hard you might fall into a magical cave.
If you could imagine a 'B' kinda grotto, I am imagining that there is now a special treasure there.
That B grotto? There's a fake wall in the westish direction
There's a grotto somewhere,  I forget which one. It has some treasures in a fake wall on the north side!
I heard in a grotto nearby, There's ths wall on the south side? Actually a fake wall.
That B grotto? There's a fake wall on the south I swear.
I think trees are beautiful and so wonderful. That tree over there was plant one hunder years ago and it still stands today also there's a treasure in its leaves.
A can assure you that tree is one of the world's finest
Wow, what a wonderful, beautiful tree. I want to just stare at it for hours and hours.
There appears to be a treasure lodged in the trunk of this wonderful beautiful tree.
It's difficult to stop admiring this tree, I know.
